languages.text: "В общем, Ваша Светлость, мы с вами пойдем, ладно? Негоже Лорд-капитану одно{mf|му|й} туда отправляться, да поможет нам всем Бог-Император..." {n}Офицер старается говорить бесстрастно, однако его голос предательски дрожит — от перспективы зайти в смертельный отсек ему панически страшно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мы с вами, Ваша Светлость. Ведите... и да поможет нам Бог-Император".
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "The point is, we should go with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, with your permission. It just wouldn't be right for the Lord Captain to go in there alone. God-Emperor help us all..." {n}The officer tries his best to speak calmly, but his voice is quivering. The thought of going inside the compartment that has become a death trap fills him with dread bordering on panic.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В общем, Ваша Светлость, мы с вами пойдем, ладно? Негоже Лорд-капитану одно{mf|му|й} туда отправляться, да поможет нам всем Бог-Император..." {n}Офицер старается говорить бесстрастно, однако его голос предательски дрожит — от перспективы зайти в смертельный отсек ему панически страшно.{/n}

God-Emperor help us all..." {n}The officer tries his best to speak calmly, but his voice is quivering. The thought of going inside the compartment that has become a death trap fills him with dread bordering on panic.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: « Ce que j'essaie de dire, c'est que nous devrions accompagner Votre Seigneurie, avec votre permission. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ne devrait pas y aller {mf|seul|seule}, ce serait mal avisé. L'Empereur-Dieu nous vienne en aide... » {n}L'officier fait tout son possible pour rester calme, mais sa voix tremble. L'idée de se jeter dans le piège mortel du compartiment l'emplit d'une peur proche de la panique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The point is, we should go with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, with your permission. It just wouldn't be right for the Lord Captain to go in there alone. God-Emperor help us all..." {n}The officer tries his best to speak calmly, but his voice is quivering. The thought of going inside the compartment that has become a death trap fills him with dread bordering on panic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce que j'essaie de dire, c'est que nous devrions accompagner Votre Seigneurie, avec votre permission. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ne devrait pas y aller {mf|seul|seule}, ce serait mal avisé. L'Empereur-Dieu nous vienne en aide... » {n}L'officier fait tout son possible pour rester calme, mais sa voix tremble. L'idée de se jeter dans le piège mortel du compartiment l'emplit d'une peur proche de la panique.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: 「重要なのは、陛下の許可を得て、陛下と共に行くべきだということなのです。ロード・キャプテンがひとりで行くなどおかしい。神帝陛下、我々をお助け下さい…」{n}士官は努めて冷静に話そうとするが、その声は震えている。死の罠と化した区画の中に入ることを考えて、パニックに近い恐怖で精神が満たされているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The point is, we should go with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, with your permission. It just wouldn't be right for the Lord Captain to go in there alone. God-Emperor help us all..." {n}The officer tries his best to speak calmly, but his voice is quivering. The thought of going inside the compartment that has become a death trap fills him with dread bordering on panic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「重要なのは、陛下の許可を得て、陛下と共に行くべきだということなのです。ロード・キャプテンがひとりで行くなどおかしい。神帝陛下、我々をお助け下さい…」{n}士官は努めて冷静に話そうとするが、その声は震えている。死の罠と化した区画の中に入ることを考えて、パニックに近い恐怖で精神が満たされているようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: “无论如何，我们都应该征求您的同意，与您一起进去，大人。只让领主舰长一个人进去，那肯定是不对的。愿神皇保佑我们……”{n}这位军官尽可能地以平静的声音开了口，但他的声音还是在不住颤抖。一想到要踏入眼前的死亡陷阱，他就几乎无法克制自己的恐慌。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The point is, we should go with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, with your permission. It just wouldn't be right for the Lord Captain to go in there alone. God-Emperor help us all..." {n}The officer tries his best to speak calmly, but his voice is quivering. The thought of going inside the compartment that has become a death trap fills him with dread bordering on panic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “无论如何，我们都应该征求您的同意，与您一起进去，大人。只让领主舰长一个人进去，那肯定是不对的。愿神皇保佑我们……”{n}这位军官尽可能地以平静的声音开了口，但他的声音还是在不住颤抖。一想到要踏入眼前的死亡陷阱，他就几乎无法克制自己的恐慌。{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Es geht darum, dass wir Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} begleiten sollten. Mit Eurer Erlaubnis. Es wäre einfach nicht richtig, wenn der Lord Captain allein dort hineingeht. Der Gottimperator steh uns allen bei ..." {n}Der Offizier müht sich nach Kräften, ruhig zu sprechen, doch seine Stimme zittert. Der Gedanke, das Modul zu betreten, dass zur Todesfalle geworden ist, erfüllt ihn mit Angst, die an Panik grenzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The point is, we should go with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, with your permission. It just wouldn't be right for the Lord Captain to go in there alone. God-Emperor help us all..." {n}The officer tries his best to speak calmly, but his voice is quivering. The thought of going inside the compartment that has become a death trap fills him with dread bordering on panic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es geht darum, dass wir Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} begleiten sollten. Mit Eurer Erlaubnis. Es wäre einfach nicht richtig, wenn der Lord Captain allein dort hineingeht. Der Gottimperator steh uns allen bei ..." {n}Der Offizier müht sich nach Kräften, ruhig zu sprechen, doch seine Stimme zittert. Der Gedanke, das Modul zu betreten, dass zur Todesfalle geworden ist, erfüllt ihn mit Angst, die an Panik grenzt.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: «El caso es que deberíamos acompañarle, mi{mf|lord|lady}, con su permiso. No estaría bien que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán entrase {mf|solo|sola}. Que el Dios Emperador nos ayude a todos...». {n}El guardia hace lo posible por mantener el tipo, pero le tiembla la voz. La idea de entrar en el compartimento que se ha convertido en una trampa mortal le infunde un temor que raya en el pánico.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The point is, we should go with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, with your permission. It just wouldn't be right for the Lord Captain to go in there alone. God-Emperor help us all..." {n}The officer tries his best to speak calmly, but his voice is quivering. The thought of going inside the compartment that has become a death trap fills him with dread bordering on panic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El caso es que deberíamos acompañarle, mi{mf|lord|lady}, con su permiso. No estaría bien que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán entrase {mf|solo|sola}. Que el Dios Emperador nos ayude a todos...». {n}El guardia hace lo posible por mantener el tipo, pero le tiembla la voz. La idea de entrar en el compartimento que se ha convertido en una trampa mortal le infunde un temor que raya en el pánico.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Demek istediğim, izniniz olursa biz de {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'yle gitsek. Lord Kaptan'ın oraya bir başına girmesi doğru olmaz. Tanrı İmparator hepimizin yardımcısı olsun." {n}Subay, sakince konuşmak için büyük çaba gösteriyor ancak sesinin titremesini engelleyemiyor. Ölüm tuzağına dönüşmüş kompartımana girme düşüncesi, onu neredeyse paniğe sürükleyecek derecede dehşete düşürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The point is, we should go with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, with your permission. It just wouldn't be right for the Lord Captain to go in there alone. God-Emperor help us all..." {n}The officer tries his best to speak calmly, but his voice is quivering. The thought of going inside the compartment that has become a death trap fills him with dread bordering on panic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Demek istediğim: Biz de {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'yle gitmeliyiz izniniz olursa. Lord Kaptan'ın oraya kendi başına girmesi doğru olmaz. Tanrı İmparator hepimizin yardımcısı olsun." {n}Subay sakince konuşmak için büyük çaba gösteriyor ancak sesinin titremesini engelleyemiyor. Bir ölüm tuzağına dönüşmüş kompartımana girme düşüncesi, onu, neredeyse paniğe sürükleyecek derecede dehşete düşürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow
